QuestData.Title: Gimme Shelter!
QuestData.Description: Please, $r! You must help me!$b$bI've barely managed to survive, what with naga, sharks, and that horrible monster that attacked our ship.$b$bI can see a cave that might be safe, but I don't dare try to make it unless I know there's air inside.$b$bCan you make sure it's ok?
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate Smuggler's Scar in the Kelp'thar forest, then signal to Adarrah that it's safe to enter.
QuestData.RewardText: I cannot thank you enough, $r.$b$bI just hope this whole nightmare has a happy ending.
